data.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: In 20 years, you probably won't even remember this.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Never cowardly or cruel. Never give up, never give in.
data.author: Doctor Who

data.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you'll be criticized anyway.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt.

data.quote: Plant your garden and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers.
data.author: Jose Luis Borges

data.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more so that we may fear less.
data.author: Marie Curie

data.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: This too, shall pass.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: There is only one happiness in life â€“ to love and to be loved.
data.author: George Sand

data.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
data.author: Harvey Fierstein

data.quote: Life's too mysterious to take too serious.
data.author: Mary Engelbreit

data.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: It's not about how hard you can hit; it's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
data.author: Rocky Balboa

data.quote: It's OK to not be OK, as long as you don't stay that way.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: May I never be complete. May I never be content. May I never be perfect.
data.author: Chuck Palahniuk
